loop
Create Device Object

MQTT Subscriber :
 1. Topic for TTN : v3/{application_id}@ttn/devices/+/up 
 2. Topic for TTS : v3/{application_id}/devices/+/up 
 3. Topic for ChirpStackV4 :  application/{application_id}/device/+/event/up 
 4. Topic for Actility : See documentation.
info:
1. Topic for TTN : v3/{application_id}@ttn/devices/+/up
Replace {application_id} by your application id in TTN. /!\ don't forget @ttn

2. Topic for TTS : v3/{application_id}/devices/+/up
Replace {application_id} by your application id in TTN.

3. Topic for ChirpStackV4 :  application/{application_id}/device/+/event/up
Replace {application_id} by your application id (it's a number, not a name !).

4. Topic for Actility : Documentation for using Actility  Broker : https://docs.thingpark.com/thingpark-x/latest/Connector/BROKER_MQTT/. 
- For actility-USMB Broker, univ-smb/devices/+/uplink
- For HiveMQ Broker : mqtt/things/+/uplink
